'''Activation Devices''' are items that can be found in the [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]]. They are used during the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[Chessboard of Safhe Shatranj]]'' to activate the [[Chess Piece]]s located in [[Safhe Shatranj]].

All activation devices can be found floating in the air at the place the chess piece represents. [[Activation Device: Deshret's Glass Goblet]] and [[Activation Device: The Mausoleum of King Deshret]] are only obtainable after the completion of the first step in ''[[Memories of Gurabad]]''. After chasing each Activation Device, they appear at the {{Icon|Activation Device}} icon on the minimap.
